application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: To carry out tree surgery including a crown reduction by 2m to One Maple T20 on TPO 346
decision_conditions: The Norway Maple is situated within the Rear garden of 92 Ryeland Close and due to the layout of nearby properties a large proportion of local residents can see this Maple from their properties and the public highway.. As a result it has a moderate to high amenity value and contributes to the arboricultural character of the area.
No reasons have been provided for the proposed work, the work is unjustified and will have a detrimental impact on the visual amenity and arboreal character of the area.
The removal of deadwood, dangerous / hanging branches and ivy:  This does not require the formal consent of the Council.
